title: Why You Are So Important for this Life:
description: Everyday, someone suffers from depression, loneliness and pain. The poetic words of this book will enrich a person to find worth and success through the very trials that befall them. This book is a thirty day program, where one can find strength, joy, laughter, love, motivation and reasons to live. Life can be hard and unfair, however, through this thirty day enrichment book, one can conquer all obstacles and smile while doing it.
author: Raymond Sturgis
